name: Better Hype Machine (aka Hypem) Nightmode
description:
• New night theme for Hype Machine! Based off my other 'Daytime' style, this new theme features the usual refinements but with a fresh coat of paint to give your eyes a rest

• Various UI, font, & color tweaks to better resemble a music player

• Moved user menu & search bar for better access when window is pinned to half screen

• Eliminated distracting & unnecessary elements for a much cleaner look
additional_info:
Since this theme is brand new, I'll more than likely discover things that haven't been converted to darker colors yet. Minor updates such as changing the color of some elements will be updated periodically and will not get release notes. Major updates (in the case of a major site re-design or new additional elements/features) will get release notes depending on how much needs to be changed. Any feedback is always appreciated.

Update 5-12-18
Various tweaks for a better nighttime experience. Shades of icons are now dimmer and fit more in line with a dark-style theme. Overall much less jarring on the eyes.
